ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-np8:1.1_0: At one time when the Buddha was staying at Sāvatthī in Anāthapiṇḍika’s Monastery,
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-np8:1.2_0: At that time the nuns staying at the precincts belonging to a certain association were weak because of a lack of rice porridge.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-np8:1.3_0: Then, after collecting voluntary contributions to supply the nuns with rice porridge, that association stored the ingredients in a shop. They then went to the nuns and said,
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-np8:1.4_0: “Venerables, rice porridge ingredients are stored in such-and-such a shop. Please get rice from that as much rice porridge.”
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-np8:1.5_0: But the nuns exchanged those requisites for tonics, which they then used.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-np8:1.6_0: When that association found out about this, they complained and criticized them,
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-np8:1.7_0: “When collective ingredients are designated for a specific purpose, how could the nuns exchange them for something else?” ...
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-np8:1.8_0: “Is it true, monks, that the nuns did this?”
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-np8:1.11_0: “... When collective ingredients are designated for a specific purpose, how could the nuns exchange them for something else?
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-np8:1.12_0: This won’t give rise to confidence in those without it ...”
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-np8:1.13_0: “And, monks, the nuns should recite this training rule like this:
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-np8:1.14.1_0: ‘When a collective requisite is designated for a specific purpose, if a nun exchanges it for something else, she commits an offense entailing relinquishment and confession.’”
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-np8:2.4_0: ...The nun who has been given the full ordination by both Sanghas through a legal procedure consisting of one motion and three announcements that is irreversible and fit to stand—this sort of nun is meant in this case.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-np8:2.5_0: A requisite is designated for a specific purpose:
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-np8:2.6_0: it was given for a specific purpose.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-np8:2.8_0: belonging to a group, not to the Sangha, not to an individual nun.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-np8:2.10_0: if, apart from the purpose for which it was given, she exchanges it for something else, then for the effort there is an act of wrong conduct.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-np8:2.11_0: When he gets the robe-cloth, it becomes subject to relinquishment.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-np8:2.12_0: It is to be relinquished to the Sangha of nuns, a group, or an individual nun.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-np8:2.13_0: “And, monks, it should be relinquished like this. ...
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-np8:2.15_0: ‘Venerables, this thing, which I got in exchange for a collective requisite that was designated for a specific purpose, is to be relinquished. I relinquish it to the Sangha.’ ...
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-np8:2.19.1_0: If it is for a specific purpose and she perceives that it is, and she exchanges it for something else, she commits an offense entailing relinquishment and confession.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-np8:2.20_0: If it is for a specific purpose, but she is unsure of it, and she exchanges it for something else, she commits an offense entailing relinquishment and confession.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-np8:2.21_0: If it is for a specific purpose, but she does not perceive that it is, and she exchanges it for something else, she commits an offense entailing relinquishment and confession.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-np8:2.22_0: When she receives in return what had been relinquished, it is to be used in accordance with the intention of the donors.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-np8:2.23_0: If it is not for a specific purpose, but she perceives that it is, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-np8:2.24_0: If it is not for a specific purpose, but she is unsure of it, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-np8:2.25_0: If it is not for a specific purpose, and she does not perceive that it is, there is no offense.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-np8:2.26.1_0: there is no offense for him.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-np8:2.27_0: if she makes use of the remainder;
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-np8:2.28_0: if she makes use of it after getting permission from the owners;
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-np8:2.31_0: if she is the first offender.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-np8:2.32_0: The eighth training rule is finished.
